event_id.description: Unique identifier for the event (GUID), generated for each unique event, for de-duplication purposes

tenant_id.description: Application ID (4 letter code) or ServiceNow identifier related to the pipeline/domain/process owner (tenant of the tool)

source_app.description: Standardized source application name (aqueduct, unify, lum, etc)

environment.description: Environment (dev, uat, pre-prod, prod, test or others)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the event in epoch milliseconds

additional_info.description: Optional additional fields structured as an inner JSON
